title: Mastercard Credit Card Support & FAQs
description: Get the card support and help information you need from Mastercard. Read through the FAQ's or contact us to find answers to all of your questions.

data.heading: Lost or stolen card?
para: Don’t worry, we’ve got it under control. Call 1-800-MASTERCARD (1-800-627-8372) in the U.S.

data.heading: Explore card benefits
para: Shopping protection, savings and assistance are just some of the many ways using a Mastercard can help you

data.heading: Reload a prepaid card
para: Simply load and use your card wherever Debit Mastercard is accepted

data.heading: Identity Theft Alerts
para: Help safeguard your personal information online with this free benefit for Mastercard cardholders
